item.title: 南非财政部长就预算问题抨击民主联盟
item.description: 南非财政部长伊诺克-戈东瓦纳（Enoch Godongwana）批评了民主联盟反对一项重要预算立法的计划，并表示如果该党真的反对，就应该退出国家联合政府。【原文：South African Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana criticized the Democratic Alliance over its plan to oppose a key piece of budget legislation, and suggested that if the party does object it should quit the nation’s coalition government.】

item.title: 波利瓦尔主张扩大美国贸易为加拿大军事提供资金
item.description: 加拿大保守党领袖皮埃尔-波利瓦尔（Pierre Poilievre）表示，他的政府将推动美墨加协议的紧急重新谈判，而增加对美贸易所获得的所有收入将用于资助加拿大扩军。【原文：Canadian Conservative Leader Pierre Poilievre says his government would push for an urgent renegotiation of the US-Mexico-Canada Agreement, and all revenues collected from increased trade with the US would fund expanding Canada’s military.】

item.title: 咨询巨头 BCG 在人工智能工作蓬勃发展之际招聘 1,000 名员工
item.description: 波士顿咨询公司（Boston Consulting Group）的人工智能相关服务需求激增，去年该公司员工人数增加了 1000 人。【原文：Boston Consulting Group saw its headcount swell by 1,000 staffers last year as demand for its artificial intelligence-related services boomed.】

item.title: 美国企业为关税囤积现金而非回购股票
item.description: 上个月，美国公司宣布的股票回购（按美元计算）是自科维德大流行以来最少的，这是担心经济增长和全球贸易战影响而囤积现金的早期迹象。【原文：US companies last month announced the fewest stock buybacks, in dollar terms, since the Covid pandemic, an early sign of cash hoarding from worries about economic growth and the impact of a global trade war.】

item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Beaten-down corporate bonds from automakers could rally after Wednesday’s tariff announcement from US President Donald Trump, making the debt an attractive purchase, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 据说埃尼公司将为 Plenitude 讨论 130 亿欧元的估值
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，埃尼公司（Eni SpA）正在为其 Plenitude 可再生能源部门讨论高达 130 亿欧元（140 亿美元）的潜在估值（包括债务），因为该公司正在为该业务的股份收集竞标。【原文：Eni SpA is discussing a potential valuation of as much as €13 billion ($14 billion) including debt for its Plenitude renewables arm as it gathers bids for a stake in the business, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚最高央行行长回击总统攻击
item.description: 在哥伦比亚总统指责央行拒绝降息是破坏经济的一天之后，央行行长莱昂纳多-比利亚尔（Leonardo Villar）表示，应对政治压力是 "工作的一部分"。【原文：A day after Colombia’s president accused the central bank of economic sabotage for its refusal to cut interest rates, bank Governor Leonardo Villar said that dealing with political pressure is “part of the job.”】

item.title: 特朗普的贸易战迫使加拿大决定是否打击美国汽车业
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）领导的政府正准备对白宫最新推出的进口税大举反击，加拿大的汽车买家正努力抵御贸易战带来的价格上涨。【原文：Vehicle buyers in Canada are trying to beat the price hikes of a trade war, as the government of Prime Minister Mark Carney prepares to strike back against the latest fusillade of import taxes from the White House.】

item.title: Grubhub 在纽约市主要市场重塑无缝外卖品牌
item.description: 餐饮外卖公司 Grubhub 正在其最大的市场纽约重振拥有四分之一世纪历史的 Seamless 品牌，以期在这个关键城市推动增长，因为它在全国范围内都落后于竞争对手。【原文：Food delivery company Grubhub is reviving the quarter-century-old Seamless brand in New York, its biggest market, in a bid to drive growth in a key city as it lags behind rivals nationally.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税前经济担忧加剧，美国股市下滑
item.description: 周三，不确定性再次笼罩市场，交易员们对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普在收盘后宣布的关税政策忐忑不安。【原文：Uncertainty gripped markets again on Wednesday with traders on edge ahead to President Donald Trump’s tariff announcement after the closing bell.】

item.description: 欧洲复兴开发银行计划今年向乌克兰能源行业投资 10 亿欧元（11 亿美元），因为乌克兰的能源设施在俄罗斯的袭击中遭到了破坏。【原文：The European Bank for Reconstruction and Development plans to invest €1 billion ($1.1 billion) this year in Ukraine’s energy sector after facilities were devastated by Russian attacks.】

item.title: 瑞士交易所转向规模较小的英国交易所进行贸易技术改造
item.description: 瑞士和西班牙证券交易所运营商 SIX 集团正在考虑改用 Aquis Exchange Plc 的交易技术。【原文：SIX Group AG, the operator of the Swiss and Spanish bourses, is weighing a switch to the trading technology of Aquis Exchange Plc, a smaller UK exchange it is in the process of acquiring.】

item.title: 安大略省福特推动不含墨西哥的加美贸易协议
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）即将宣布对全球进口商品征收关税前几小时，安大略省省长再次呼吁加拿大与美国达成双边贸易协议，将墨西哥排除在外。【原文：Ontario’s premier reiterated his call for Canada to strike a bilateral trade deal with the US, cutting out Mexico, hours before tariffs on global imports were set to be unveiled by US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 欧洲央行施纳贝尔重提联合债务问题以加强欧元的作用
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员伊莎贝尔-施纳贝尔（Isabel Schnabel）说，现在是时候在欧元区再次讨论联合债务问题了，因为决策者们看到了加强欧元在全球经济中的作用的机会。【原文：European Central Bank Executive Board member Isabel Schnabel said it’s time to talk about joint debt again in the euro area as policymakers see an opportunity to bolster the currency’s role in the global economy.】

item.title: 任天堂将于 6 月 5 日发布新款 Switch 2 游戏机
item.description: 任天堂公司将于6月5日发布新款Switch 2游戏机，力图通过2017年推出的畅销机型的新版本来保持视频游戏设备的第一名。【原文：Nintendo Co. will release its new Switch 2 console on June 5, seeking to keep the No. 1 spot in video-game devices with a new version of the top-selling model it introduced in 2017.】

item.title: 美国港口计划令业界担忧，中国船舶销售崩溃
item.description: 航运公司几乎已经停止购买在中国建造的干散货商品船，因为该行业正在观望特朗普总统是否会对在中国建造的船只征收历史性的港口费。【原文：Shipping companies have all-but stopped buying dry bulk commodity carriers that were built in China as the industry waits to see if President Trump will press ahead with historic port charges on vessels constructed in the Asian country.】
